review: I ended up returning it and ordering a amazon fire tv stick.Chromecast is dependent on your phone/tablet/computer. Need to watch Netflix and text at the same time? forget it.

review: Roku is so much better but I guess it depends on your entertainment setup or use.
author: broken product

review: I love this and it is so easy to use. It's cheap and handy. I bought one for each of my TVs in my house and they are always being used. A great product at a great price. I love how they added twitch to their many great apps.  I would buy another one when I get more TVs. :)
author: Panda

review: Love my Google Chromecast! Simple and easy to install. Great space saver.
